password reset procedure: Welcome to the password reset procedure.
specify the username and the email: Please specify the username and the email address you used to register to the site.
recover password note: Note that if you did not specify an email it is impossible for you to recover your password.
title: title
type some text: If you don't have an url, type some text here in Markdown or HTML
submitting news is simpler using the: Submitting news is simple using the
